page.title: 05Chapel's new school
page.content: In November 1984 we moved into a new school it was built a few hundred yards from the old school.It is much bigger than the old school and has a lot more equipment.Instead of the portable cabins being split up around the school we are all under one roof in the new one.One of the good points about the new school is that we have much more room to work and play in.The juniors are at one end of the school with a corrider and a hall seperating us from the infants.The old learner swimming pool is being moved and is now being re-erected.A brick wall is being built by Manpower Services.
